# LeadMagic API - Complete Documentation

> LeadMagic is a B2B data enrichment API with 22 endpoints for email finding/validation, profile enrichment, company intelligence, job data, mobile number lookup, technographics, competitor analysis, and advertisement tracking.

## Authentication

All endpoints require the `X-API-Key` header:

```
curl -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://api.leadmagic.io/credits
```

Base URL: `https://api.leadmagic.io`

## Error Handling

All errors use a structured format:

```json
{
  "success": false,
  "errors": [
    {
      "type": "https://api.leadmagic.io/errors/error_code",
      "title": "Human-readable error description",
      "status": 400,
      "code": "error_code",
      "docs": "https://docs.leadmagic.io/api-reference/errors",
      "instance": "/endpoint#request-id"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "request_id": "uuid",
    "timestamp": "2026-02-10T20:37:04.253Z"
  }
}
```

HTTP Status Codes:
- 200: Success
- 400: Bad Request (invalid parameters)
- 401: Unauthorized (invalid API key)
- 404: Not Found (endpoint does not exist)
- 429: Rate limit exceeded
- 500: Internal server error

## Credit System

Credits are consumed per request. Free results: catch_all, unknown, and not_found never consume credits.

| Endpoint | Credits | Notes |
|---|---|---|
| POST /credits | 0 | Free |
| POST /email-validate | 0.05 | 20 validations per credit |
| POST /email-finder | 1 | Per email found |
| POST /personal-email-finder | 2 | Per personal email |
| POST /b2b-social-email | 5 | Per social-to-email lookup |
| POST /b2b-profile | 10 | Reverse email-to-profile |
| POST /mobile-finder | 5 | Only if found |
| POST /profile-search | 1 | Rate limited 300/min |
| POST /role-finder | 2 | Per role found |
| POST /employee-finder | 0.5 | Per page of results |
| POST /job-change-detector | 3 | Per job change check |
| POST /company-search | 1 | Per company |
| POST /company-funding | 4 | Premium intelligence |
| POST /technographics | 1 | Per tech stack |
| POST /competitors-search | 5 | Per competitor list |
| POST /jobs-finder | 1 per job | Based on results |
| GET /job-country | 0 | Metadata |
| GET /job-types | 0 | Metadata |
| POST /google/searchads | 1 per ad | Based on ads found |
| POST /meta/searchads | 1 per ad | Based on ads found |
| POST /b2b/searchads | 1 per ad | Based on ads found |
| POST /b2b/ad-details | 2 | Per ad detail |

---

## POST /credits

Check your available API credits.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/credits \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json"
```

Response:
```json
{
  "credits": 12500
}
```

---

## POST /email-validate

Validate email deliverability and get company information.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/email-validate \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email": "jesse@leadmagic.io"}'
```

Parameters:
- `email` (required): Email address to validate
- `first_name` (optional): First name for enrichment
- `last_name` (optional): Last name for enrichment

Response:
```json
{
  "email": "jesse@leadmagic.io",
  "email_status": "valid",
  "credits_consumed": 0.05,
  "message": "Email is valid.",
  "is_domain_catch_all": false,
  "mx_record": "leadmagic.io",
  "mx_provider": "Google Workspace",
  "mx_security_gateway": false,
  "company_name": "leadmagic",
  "company_industry": "internet",
  "company_size": "11-50",
  "company_founded": 2022,
  "company_location": {
    "name": "boston, massachusetts, united states",
    "locality": "boston",
    "region": "massachusetts",
    "metro": "boston",
    "country": "united states",
    "continent": "north america",
    "street_address": "1 seaport lane",
    "address_line_2": null,
    "postal_code": "02210",
    "geo": null
  },
  "company_linkedin_url": "linkedin.com/company/leadmagichq",
  "company_linkedin_id": "75153174",
  "company_facebook_url": null,
  "company_twitter_url": null,
  "company_type": "private"
}
```

Status values: `valid`, `valid_catch_all`, `invalid`, `unknown`, `catch_all`

---

## POST /email-finder

Find verified work email addresses using name and company.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/email-finder \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "first_name": "Satya",
    "last_name": "Nadella",
    "domain": "microsoft.com",
    "company_name": "Microsoft"
  }'
```

Parameters:
- `first_name` (required): First name
- `last_name` (required): Last name
- `domain` (required): Company domain
- `company_name` (optional): Company name

Response:
```json
{
  "email": "snadella@microsoft.com",
  "status": "valid",
  "credits_consumed": 1,
  "message": "Email was confidently found and verified.",
  "first_name": "Satya",
  "last_name": "Nadella",
  "domain": "microsoft.com",
  "mx_record": "microsoft-com.mail.protection.outlook.com",
  "mx_provider": "microsoft",
  "mx_security_gateway": false,
  "has_mx": true,
  "mx_records_full": [],
  "company_name": "",
  "company_industry": null,
  "company_size": null,
  "company_founded": null,
  "company_type": null,
  "company_location": {
    "name": null,
    "locality": null,
    "region": null,
    "metro": null,
    "country": null,
    "continent": null,
    "street_address": null,
    "address_line_2": null,
    "postal_code": null,
    "geo": null
  },
  "company_linkedin_url": null,
  "company_linkedin_id": null,
  "company_facebook_url": null,
  "company_twitter_url": null
}
```

Status values: `valid`, `valid_catch_all`, `not_found`

---

## POST /personal-email-finder

Find personal email addresses from LinkedIn profile URLs.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/personal-email-finder \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/"}'
```

Parameters:
- `profile_url` (required): LinkedIn profile URL

Response (found):
```json
{
  "personal_email": "user@gmail.com",
  "status": "found",
  "credits_consumed": 2,
  "message": "Personal email found"
}
```

Response (not found):
```json
{
  "message": "No personal email found for the provided criteria",
  "credits_consumed": 0
}
```

---

## POST /b2b-social-email

Find work emails from LinkedIn profile URLs.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/b2b-social-email \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/"}'
```

Parameters:
- `profile_url` (required): LinkedIn profile URL

Response (found):
```json
{
  "profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/",
  "work_email": "user@company.com",
  "credits_consumed": 5,
  "message": "Email found."
}
```

Response (not found):
```json
{
  "profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/",
  "credits_consumed": 0,
  "message": "Email not found."
}
```

---

## POST /b2b-profile

Find LinkedIn profiles from work email addresses.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/b2b-profile \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"work_email": "jesse@leadmagic.io"}'
```

Parameters:
- `work_email` (required): Work email address

Response:
```json
{
  "profile_url": "http://www.linkedin.com/in/jesseoue",
  "message": "Profile URL found",
  "credits_consumed": 10
}
```

---

## POST /mobile-finder

Find mobile phone numbers using various identifiers. Provide at least one parameter.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/mobile-finder \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/"}'
```

Parameters (at least one required):
- `profile_url`: LinkedIn profile URL
- `work_email`: Work email address
- `personal_email`: Personal email address

Response (found):
```json
{
  "profile_url": "linkedin.com/in/example",
  "mobile_number": "+15551234567",
  "credits_consumed": 5,
  "message": "Mobile number found"
}
```

Response (not found):
```json
{
  "profile_url": "linkedin.com/in/example",
  "mobile_number": null,
  "credits_consumed": 0,
  "message": "No mobile number found"
}
```

---

## POST /profile-search

Get comprehensive B2B profile information from LinkedIn URL.
Rate limit: 300 requests/minute. Public profiles only.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/profile-search \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/"}'
```

Parameters:
- `profile_url` (required): LinkedIn profile URL

Response:
```json
{
  "profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/",
  "first_name": "John",
  "last_name": "Doe",
  "full_name": "John Doe",
  "public_identifier": "johndoe",
  "headline": "CEO at Company",
  "company_name": "Company",
  "company_size": "51-200",
  "company_industry": "Technology",
  "company_linkedin_url": "linkedin.com/company/company",
  "company_website": "company.com",
  "total_tenure_months": "48",
  "total_tenure_days": "1440",
  "total_tenure_years": "4.0",
  "connections": 500,
  "followers": 1200,
  "country": "United States",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "about": "Bio description here.",
  "experiences": [
    {
      "company_id": "12345",
      "title": "CEO",
      "subtitle": "Company",
      "caption": "2020 - Present"
    }
  ],
  "educations": [
    {
      "title": "University Name",
      "caption": "2010 - 2014"
    }
  ],
  "credits_consumed": 1
}
```

---

## POST /role-finder

Find specific roles within companies.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/role-finder \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "job_title": "CEO",
    "company_name": "LeadMagic",
    "company_domain": "leadmagic.io"
  }'
```

Parameters:
- `job_title` (required): Job title to search for
- `company_name` (required, or company_domain): Company name
- `company_domain` (required, or company_name): Company domain
- `company_profile_url` (optional): Company LinkedIn URL

Response:
```json
{
  "name": "Jesse Ouellette",
  "profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/jesseoue",
  "first_name": "Jesse",
  "last_name": "Ouellette",
  "message": "Role Found",
  "credits_consumed": 2,
  "company_name": "Leadmagic",
  "company_website": "leadmagic.io"
}
```

---

## POST /employee-finder

Find employees of specific companies with pagination.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/employee-finder \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_name": "Microsoft", "page": 1, "per_page": 5}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_name` (required): Company name
- `page` (optional, default 1): Page number
- `per_page` (optional, default 10): Results per page

Response:
```json
{
  "message": "Data found for the given company.",
  "total_count": 10,
  "returned_count": 10,
  "credits_consumed": 0.5,
  "data": [
    {
      "first_name": "john",
      "last_name": "doe",
      "title": "Software Engineer",
      "website": "microsoft.com",
      "company_name": "Microsoft"
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## POST /job-change-detector

Detect when contacts change jobs.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/job-change-detector \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "profile_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/example/",
    "company_name": "OldCompany"
  }'
```

Parameters:
- `profile_url` (required): LinkedIn profile URL
- `company_name` (required, or company_domain): Previous company name
- `company_domain` (required, or company_name): Previous company domain

Response:
```json
{
  "changed": true,
  "previous_company": "OldCompany",
  "current_company": "NewCompany",
  "credits_consumed": 3,
  "message": "Job change detected"
}
```

---

## POST /company-search

Get detailed company information and insights.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/company-search \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "microsoft.com"}'
```

Parameters (at least one required):
- `company_domain`: Company website domain
- `company_name`: Company name
- `profile_url`: Company LinkedIn URL

Response:
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 1,
  "message": "Company found",
  "companyName": "Microsoft",
  "companyId": 1035,
  "locations": [
    {
      "country": "US",
      "city": "Redmond",
      "geographicArea": "Washington",
      "postalCode": "98052",
      "line1": "1 Microsoft Way",
      "line2": null,
      "description": null,
      "headquarter": true,
      "localizedName": "Redmond",
      "latitude": 47.6398,
      "longitude": -122.1286
    }
  ],
  "employeeCount": 174769,
  "specialities": ["Business Software", "Developer Tools", "Cloud Computing", "AI"],
  "employeeCountRange": {"start": 100001, "end": 200000},
  "tagline": null,
  "followerCount": 27540712,
  "industry": "Computer Software",
  "description": "Company description...",
  "websiteUrl": "https://news.microsoft.com/",
  "headquarter": {
    "country": "US",
    "city": "Redmond",
    "geographicArea": "Washington",
    "postalCode": "98052",
    "line1": "1 Microsoft Way"
  },
  "foundedOn": null,
  "universalName": "microsoft",
  "hashtag": "#microsoftlife",
  "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft/",
  "logo_url": "https://logo.leadmagic.io/news.microsoft.com",
  "founded_year": "1975",
  "ownership_status": "public",
  "revenue": 293812000000,
  "revenue_formatted": "293.8B",
  "employee_range": "100,000 - 9,999,999",
  "total_funding": "61M",
  "funding_rounds": 1,
  "last_funding_round": "IPO",
  "last_funding_amount": 61000000,
  "last_funding_date": "Mar 1986",
  "competitors": ["IBM", "Google", "Oracle", "SAP", "Apple", "Salesforce"],
  "acquisitions_count": 5,
  "twitter_url": "twitter.com/microsoft",
  "linkedin_url": "linkedin.com/company/microsoft",
  "facebook_url": "facebook.com/microsoft",
  "stock_ticker": "msft"
}
```

---

## POST /company-funding

Get comprehensive funding, financial, and competitive intelligence.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/company-funding \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "leadmagic.io"}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_domain` (required): Company domain

Response:
```json
{
  "basicInfo": {
    "companyName": "LeadMagic",
    "description": "",
    "shortName": "LeadMagic",
    "founded": "2021",
    "headquarters": {
      "city": "Boston",
      "state": "Massachusetts",
      "country": "USA",
      "fullAddress": "Boston, Massachusetts, USA"
    },
    "primaryDomain": "leadmagic.io",
    "phone": "N/A",
    "status": "NEW",
    "followers": 7,
    "ownership": "Private"
  },
  "financialInfo": {
    "revenue": 1260000,
    "formattedRevenue": "1.3M",
    "totalFunding": "N/A",
    "formattedFunding": "0",
    "lastFundingRound": "N/A",
    "fundingHistory": []
  },
  "companySize": {
    "employees": 4,
    "employeeRange": "1 - 25",
    "employeeGrowth": "N/A"
  },
  "leadership": {
    "ceo": {
      "firstName": "Jesse",
      "lastName": "Ouellette",
      "designation": "Founder",
      "linkedIn": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/jesseoue",
      "twitter": "https://twitter.com/jesseogtm"
    }
  },
  "industryAndSectors": {
    "industrySectors": ["SaaS"],
    "industries": ["Software, Internet & Computer Services"],
    "technologyStack": "N/A"
  },
  "topCompetitors": [],
  "acquisitions": [],
  "socialMedia": [
    {"platform": "linkedIn", "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/leadmagichq"}
  ],
  "news": [],
  "pressReleases": [],
  "keyHighlights": [],
  "summarySection": "LeadMagic was founded in 2021...",
  "credits_consumed": 4
}
```

---

## POST /technographics

Identify the technology stack a company uses.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/technographics \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "example.com"}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_domain` (required): Company domain

Response (found):
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 1,
  "technologies": ["React", "Node.js", "AWS", "PostgreSQL"],
  "message": "Technology stack found"
}
```

Response (not found):
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 0,
  "message": "No technology stack information available for this company"
}
```

---

## POST /competitors-search

Discover competitor companies with financial and operational data.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/competitors-search \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "microsoft.com"}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_domain` (required): Company domain

Response:
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 5,
  "competitors": [
    {
      "name": "Microsoft",
      "shortDescription": "Microsoft is a company that develops software, hardware, and cloud computing products.",
      "founded_year": "1975",
      "companyType": "public",
      "hq": "Redmond, US",
      "employeesCount": 177751,
      "valuation": 3073487709600,
      "tags": [
        {"name": "Technology", "slug": "technology", "primary": true}
      ],
      "growth": 0,
      "non_hq_locations": ["Tirana, AL", "Algiers, DZ"],
      "more_locations": true,
      "financial_metrics": {
        "currency_code": "USD",
        "period": "FY, 2025",
        "revenue": 281724000000,
        "cost_of_goods_sold": 87831000000,
        "gross_profit": 193893000000,
        "net_income": 101832000000
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## POST /jobs-finder

Search job postings with advanced filtering.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/jobs-finder \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "company_name": "Microsoft",
    "job_title": "Software Engineer",
    "page": 1,
    "per_page": 5
  }'
```

Parameters:
- `company_name` (optional): Filter by company
- `company_website` (optional): Filter by company domain
- `job_title` (optional): Filter by job title
- `location` (optional): Filter by location
- `experience_level` (optional): entry, mid, senior, executive
- `job_description` (optional): Keywords in description
- `country_id` (optional): Country code
- `page` (optional, default 1): Page number
- `per_page` (optional, max 50): Results per page

Response:
```json
{
  "total_count": 13464,
  "page": 1,
  "per_page": 2,
  "total_pages": 6732,
  "credits_consumed": 2,
  "results": [
    {
      "company": {
        "name": "Microsoft",
        "website_url": "https://www.microsoft.com/",
        "linkedin_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft/",
        "twitter_handle": "Microsoft",
        "github_url": "https://github.com/microsoft"
      },
      "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
      "location": "Athens, Attica, Greece",
      "types": [{"id": 1, "name": "Full Time"}],
      "cities": [
        {
          "geonameid": 264371,
          "asciiname": "Athens",
          "name": "Athens",
          "country": {"id": 88, "code": "GR", "name": "Greece"},
          "timezone": "Europe/Athens",
          "latitude": "37.98376",
          "longitude": "23.72784"
        }
      ],
      "states": [],
      "countries": [{"id": 88, "code": "GR", "name": "Greece"}],
      "regions": [{"id": 3, "name": "Europe"}],
      "expired": null,
      "description": "Full job description text...",
      "experience_level": "Senior Level",
      "language": "en",
      "salary_min": null,
      "salary_max": null,
      "salary_currency": "EUR",
      "published_at": "2025-12-04T04:26:00Z",
      "remote": false,
      "application_url": "https://jobs.careers.microsoft.com/global/en/job/1879677/"
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## GET /job-country

Get list of available countries for job filtering.

Request:
```bash
curl -X GET https://api.leadmagic.io/job-country \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY"
```

Response:
```json
[
  {"id": "AF", "name": "Afghanistan"},
  {"id": "US", "name": "United States"},
  {"id": "GB", "name": "United Kingdom"}
]
```

---

## GET /job-types

Get list of available job types.

Request:
```bash
curl -X GET https://api.leadmagic.io/job-types \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY"
```

Response:
```json
[
  {"id": 1, "name": "Full Time"},
  {"id": 2, "name": "Part Time"},
  {"id": 3, "name": "Temporary"},
  {"id": 4, "name": "Internship"},
  {"id": 5, "name": "Freelance"},
  {"id": 6, "name": "Contract"},
  {"id": 7, "name": "Apprenticeship"}
]
```

---

## POST /google/searchads

Find Google Ads campaigns by company.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/google/searchads \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "example.com", "company_name": "Example"}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_domain` (required): Company domain
- `company_name` (optional): Company name

Response:
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 8,
  "ads": [
    {
      "advertiser_id": "AR15234567890123456789",
      "creative_id": "CR98765432109876543210",
      "advertiser_name": "Example Inc",
      "format": "Text",
      "start": "2024-01-15",
      "last_seen": "2024-06-27",
      "original_url": "https://adstransparency.google.com/...",
      "variants": [
        {
          "content": "Ad copy text here.",
          "height": null,
          "width": null
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## POST /meta/searchads

Find Facebook/Instagram ads by company.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/meta/searchads \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "example.com", "company_name": "Example"}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_domain` (required): Company domain
- `company_name` (optional): Company name

Response:
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 2.6,
  "ads": [
    {
      "ad_archive_id": "987654321098765432",
      "page_id": "123456789012345678",
      "page_name": "Example",
      "is_active": true,
      "publisher_platform": ["facebook", "instagram"],
      "snapshot": {
        "body": {"markup": "Ad body text."},
        "title": "Ad Title",
        "cta_text": "Learn More",
        "images": [{"original_image_url": "https://..."}],
        "videos": []
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## POST /b2b/searchads

Search B2B LinkedIn advertisement campaigns.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/b2b/searchads \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"company_domain": "example.com", "company_name": "Example"}'
```

Parameters:
- `company_domain` (required): Company domain
- `company_name` (optional): Company name

Response:
```json
{
  "credits_consumed": 5,
  "ads": [
    {
      "ad_id": "b2b_12345",
      "company_name": "Example",
      "ad_title": "Ad Title",
      "ad_description": "Ad description text.",
      "ad_url": "https://example.com/landing"
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## POST /b2b/ad-details

Get detailed information about a specific B2B ad.

Request:
```bash
curl -X POST https://api.leadmagic.io/b2b/ad-details \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"ad_url": "https://www.linkedin.com/ad-library/detail/12345"}'
```

Parameters:
- `ad_url` (required): URL of the B2B ad from LinkedIn ad library

Response:
```json
{
  "message": "Ad details retrieved successfully.",
  "credits_consumed": 2,
  "ad_details": {
    "success": true,
    "description": "Ad description",
    "headline": "Ad headline",
    "poster": "Company Name",
    "posterTitle": "Poster title",
    "promotedBy": "Company",
    "targeting": {},
    "image": "https://...",
    "video": null,
    "carouselImages": [],
    "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/ad-library/detail/12345",
    "adType": "SPONSORED_CONTENT",
    "advertiser": "Company Name",
    "cta": "Learn More",
    "destinationUrl": "https://example.com",
    "adDuration": "30 days",
    "startDate": "2024-01-01",
    "endDate": "2024-01-31",
    "totalImpressions": 50000,
    "impressionsByCountry": []
  }
}
```

---

## Integration Examples

### Python - Email Finder
```python
import requests

API_KEY = "your-api-key"
BASE_URL = "https://api.leadmagic.io"

response = requests.post(
    f"{BASE_URL}/email-finder",
    headers={"X-API-Key": API_KEY, "Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json={
        "first_name": "Satya",
        "last_name": "Nadella",
        "domain": "microsoft.com"
    }
)
data = response.json()
print(f"Email: {data['email']}, Status: {data['status']}")
```

### JavaScript - Company Search
```javascript
const response = await fetch("https://api.leadmagic.io/company-search", {
  method: "POST",
  headers: {
    "X-API-Key": "your-api-key",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
  },
  body: JSON.stringify({ company_domain: "microsoft.com" })
});
const data = await response.json();
console.log(`Company: ${data.companyName}, Employees: ${data.employeeCount}`);
```

### Python - Full Lead Enrichment Workflow
```python
import requests

API_KEY = "your-api-key"
BASE = "https://api.leadmagic.io"
headers = {"X-API-Key": API_KEY, "Content-Type": "application/json"}

# Step 1: Find email
email_resp = requests.post(f"{BASE}/email-finder", headers=headers, json={
    "first_name": "Satya", "last_name": "Nadella", "domain": "microsoft.com"
}).json()

# Step 2: Validate email
valid_resp = requests.post(f"{BASE}/email-validate", headers=headers, json={
    "email": email_resp["email"]
}).json()

# Step 3: Get company data
company_resp = requests.post(f"{BASE}/company-search", headers=headers, json={
    "company_domain": "microsoft.com"
}).json()

# Step 4: Find mobile
mobile_resp = requests.post(f"{BASE}/mobile-finder", headers=headers, json={
    "work_email": email_resp["email"]
}).json()

print(f"Email: {email_resp['email']} ({valid_resp['email_status']})")
print(f"Company: {company_resp['companyName']} ({company_resp['employeeCount']} employees)")
print(f"Mobile: {mobile_resp.get('mobile_number', 'Not found')}")
```
